document.full_text: the streets of washington and the surrounding area echoed with the rumble of thousands of motorcycles on sunday as veterans and their supporters gathered for the main events of the annual rolling thunder rally.
document.title: veterans gather in washington for "rolling thunder"
lines_and_colors: the streets of washington and the surrounding area echoed with the rumble of thousands of motorcycles on sunday as veterans and their supporters gathered for the main events of the annual rolling thunder rally.
